doc:
Leslie French https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leslie_French 0 Leslie Richard French (23 April 1904 – 21 January 1999) was a British actor of stage and screen. French was primarily a theatre actor, as well as a director, singer and dancer, with a varied career that included the classics, musical revue, pantomime and ballet. He became most associated with the role of Ariel in William Shakespeare's The Tempest, and over the years he essayed many of Shakespeare's spirits and clowns, such as Puck, Feste and Touchstone. Leslie_Richard_French ( 23_April_1904 – 21_January_1999 ) was a_British_actor of stage_and_screen . French was primarily a_theatre_actor , as_well_as a_director_,_singer_and_dancer , with a_varied_career that included the_classics , musical_revue_,_pantomime_and_ballet . He became most associated with the_role of Ariel in William_Shakespeare 's_The_Tempest , and over the_years he essayed many of Shakespeare 's_spirits_and_clowns , such_as Puck , Feste_and_Touchstone .
